definition: (of a garment) designed to be put on by pulling it over one's head (like a sweater or T-shirt etc)

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Are —are hedge funds good or bad for America?
sentences.chinese: 套头投资对美国是好还是坏？

sentences.english: Sydney murmured the question to herself as she yanked a thick sweater over her head.
sentences.chinese: 悉妮迅速穿好一件套头厚毛衣，低声问自己。

sentences.english: The jumper is not too long or too short.
The Bith costume consisted of a slip-on mask and gloves.
sentences.chinese: 比思人道具服包括套头面具和手套。

sentences.english: The orange jumper is the most expensive in the store.
sentences.chinese: 橘黄色的套头毛衣是店里最贵的。

sentences.english: His fiancee knitted him a pullover.
sentences.chinese: 他的未婚妻为他织了一件套头毛衣。

sentences.english: NO, i'm after a size 40-neek pullover in grey.
sentences.chinese: 不，我想要一件40号灰色套头衫。

sentences.english: My mother knitted me a pullover.
sentences.chinese: 我妈给我织了一件套头的毛衣。

sentences.english: " The alien was produced as a slip-on mask, and nicknamed "Goggle-Eyes" by the crew.
sentences.chinese: 这个外星人的道具是套头面具，剧组戏称“水泡眼”。

sentences.english: A fashionable pullover tunic with faux-fur trim at the neckline and collar.
sentences.chinese: 与人造毛皮装饰的时尚套头毛衣的领口和领中山装。

sentences.english: The pullover stretched after I had worn it a few times.
sentences.chinese: 这件套头毛衣我穿了几归之后就撑大了。

sentences.english: Xiao Ming wears a red jumper.
sentences.chinese: 小明穿了一件红色套头衫。

sentences.english: I'd like to look at that new woolen pullover.
sentences.chinese: 我想看一看那件新的羊毛套头衫。

sentences.english: Mother and father are trying to buy a cheap pullover for their son.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸和妈妈想为儿子买件便宜的套头毛衣。

sentences.english: Reject the Disney Princess Pull-Ups for Lightning McQueen?
sentences.chinese: 还是退掉了迪士尼公主的套头衫换了一件闪电麦昆的？

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
